txt.en: Gathered a stick from a nearby bush
Gathered coal near the servants' oven
Built a broken snowman at a snowpile
Virgil Greenfield wants you to help him fill the snowman-field outside of Winter-home.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Built a broken snowman, TBD is proud

Much to Virgil's dismay, you caught this snowman out of the corner of your eye. This is clearly not Virgil's finest work, and it is a wonder that he did not try to hide what was clearly a failed endeavour.

Perhaps if there were more snowmen that looked like this, it might appear that Virgil did this on purpose and was crafting a new form of art far beyond the comprehension of the usual Frostbluff visitor.

It appears that Virgil only used a stick and coal for this snowman, so a quick search of Frostbluff might provide you with all the needed supplies.
The materials you need to replicate Virgil's snowman may be found around Frostbluff.\n\nIn order to replicate Virgil's snowman, you will need to gather the right materials.
The snowman-field is outside of Winter-home.\n\nNow that you have gathered all of the supplies, use a snowpile to finish building the snowman.

'You cannot be serious. Why would you want to build that? I've created such great works, but it's so easy to only be remembered for the bad.'

Virgil lets out a heavy sigh.

'Everyone makes mistakes, [placeholder]. Maybe this is one of yours! I cannot imagine why you would want to copy mine!'
Gather a stick from a nearby bush
Gather coal near the servants' oven
Build the broken snowman at a snowpile
Build the snowman at a snowpile
